verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יוֹתָ֣ם <WH3147> Jotham בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's יְרוּשָׁ֖ה <WH3388> also [was] Jerushah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צָדֽוֹק׃ <WH6659> of Zadok

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֜ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֤ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> did עֻזִּיָּ֣הוּ <WH5818> Uzziah אָבִ֔יו <WH1> according to all that his father רַ֕ק <WH7535> but לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֖א <WH935> howbeit he entered אֶל־ <WH413> about הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> not into the temple יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְע֥וֹד <WH5750> continued הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people מַשְׁחִיתִֽים׃ <WH7843> did yet corruptly

ה֗וּא <WH1931> He בָּנָ֛ה <WH1129> He built אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָעֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> the high וּבְחוֹמַ֥ת <WH2346> and on the wall הָעֹ֛פֶל <WH6077> of Ophel בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> he built לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> much

וְעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> Moreover he built בְּהַר־ <WH2022> in the mountains יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבֶחֳרָשִׁ֣ים <WH2793> and in the forests בָּנָ֔ה <WH1129> he built בִּֽירָנִיּ֖וֹת <WH1003> castles וּמִגְדָּלִֽים׃ <WH4026> and towers

וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> He נִלְחַ֞ם <WH3898> He fought עִם־ <WH5973> with מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> also with the king בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> against them And the children עַמּוֹן֮ <WH5983> of Ammon וַיֶּחֱזַ֣ק <WH2388> and prevailed עֲלֵיהֶם֒ <WH5921> over וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> gave ל֨וֹ בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> So much did the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> him the same year הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> one מֵאָה֙ <WH3967> an hundred כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver וַעֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <WH505> thousand כֹּרִים֙ <WH3734> measures חִטִּ֔ים <WH2406> of wheat וּשְׂעוֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> of barley עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand זֹ֗את <WH2063> unto הֵשִׁ֤יבוּ <WH7725> pay לוֹ֙ בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> Ammon ס וּבַשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> him both the second וְהַשְּׁלִשִֽׁית׃ <WH7992> and the third

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> became mighty יוֹתָ֑ם <WH3147> So Jotham כִּ֚י <WH3588> because הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> because he prepared דְּרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> his ways לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

וְיֶתֶר֙ <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts יוֹתָ֔ם <WH3147> of Jotham וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מִלְחֲמֹתָ֖יו <WH4421> and all his wars וּדְרָכָ֑יו <WH1870> and his ways הִנָּ֣ם <WH2005> behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <WH3789> lo they [are] written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> in the book מַלְכֵֽי־ <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and Judah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twenty וְחָמֵ֛שׁ <WH2568> He was five שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept יוֹתָם֙ <WH3147> And Jotham עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> him in the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָחָ֥ז <WH271> and Ahaz בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
